long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Carketa Chrome Extension gives you simulcast access of our appraisal tool. View any vehicle's valuation on platforms that host their VIN numbers, such as websites, DMS software or auction sites. Take the shortcut around those tough integrations and expensive fees for manual integrations charged by a typical DMS system and appraise any vehicle, anywhere.
